name.japanese: スリラーバークの礼拝堂

description: A gothic chapel within Thriller Bark's mansion where Absalom attempts to force Nami into marriage. The chapel features traditional wedding decorations and is guarded by zombie servants.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Crashes the Wedding
keyEvents.description: Sanji bursts into the chapel to rescue Nami from Absalom's forced wedding ceremony.
keyEvents.significance: The location for one of the arc's key confrontations between Sanji and Absalom.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Absalom Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: The chapel becomes a battleground as Sanji fights Absalom to protect Nami.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for the revelation of Sanji's connection to the Suke Suke no Mi.

statusHistory.reason: Chapel is operational during the forced wedding ceremony

name.japanese: スリラーバークの屋敷

description: The massive gothic mansion at the center of Thriller Bark island-ship, serving as Gecko Moria's headquarters and home to the Mysterious Four.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Confronts Gecko Moria
keyEvents.description: Luffy attempts to attack Moria directly within the mansion to retrieve stolen shadows.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for the confrontation between Luffy and the Warlord Moria.

keyEvents.title: Usopp vs Wild Zombies Chase
keyEvents.description: Usopp pursues Perona through the mansion's hallways while evading Wild Zombies and Kumashi.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the mansion's maze-like layout and multiple battle zones.

keyEvents.title: Three-Way Chase Through Mansion
keyEvents.description: A comedic chase sequence through the mansion's corridors with Kumashi destroying pillars.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the structural features and scale of the mansion.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion serves as headquarters for Thriller Bark operations

description: A massive island-ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. It serves as a floating fortress filled with zombies and is shrouded in the mysterious Florian Triangle.

keyEvents.title: Oars Attempts to Swim
keyEvents.description: The giant zombie Oars tries to swim in the waters around Thriller Bark, creating tsunamis.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Oars retaining Luffy's personality traits despite being a zombie.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and floating in the Florian Triangle
